Articles.Content: Hello I want to know if someone has the germarn V2 rocket?
What you've just done is something called 'necroposting.' It's when you post in a thread that's thirty days old, or older. It's looked down upon here. Don't do it.

Hi DatGermanGuy, as Cepheus says, reviving old threads is bad forum conduct, especially one as old as this is.

If a thread's last post is more than one month old, you should think carefully before you post to it, and only post if you are adding something of value that cannot go in it's own thread.

I would suggest that any thread more than three months old be allowed to rest in peace, no matter what you might want to add to it
